Class CBORPair

java.lang.Object
com.authlete.cbor.CBORPair
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthorizedDataElementsEntry, DeviceNameSpacesEntry, DeviceSignedItemsEntry, DigestIDsEntry, DocumentErrorEntry, ErrorItemsEntry, ErrorsEntry, IssuerNameSpacesEntry, KeyInfoEntry, ValueDigestsEntry
public class CBORPair extends Object
A class that represents a key-value pair of CBOR map.
See Also:
  • RFC 8949, 3.1. Major Types

  • Constructor Details

    • CBORPair

      public CBORPair(CBORItem key, CBORItem value)
      A constructor with a key and a value.
      Parameters:
      key - A key. If null is given, CBORNull.INSTANCE is used.
      value - A value. If null is given, CBORNull.INSTANCE is used.

    • CBORPair

      public CBORPair(CBORItem key, CBORItem value, String keyComment, String valueComment)
      A constructor with a key, a value and a comment.
      Parameters:
      key - A key. If null is given, CBORNull.INSTANCE is used.
      value - A value. If null is given, CBORNull.INSTANCE is used.
      keyComment - A comment for the key. This comment is referenced by the prettify(String, String) method.
      valueComment - A comment for the value. This comment is referenced by the prettify(String, String) method.
      Since:
      1.5

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Return "<key>: <value>".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • prettify

      public String prettify(String indent, String indentUnit)
      Stringify this CBOR pair.

      This method is called from the implementation of the prettify(String, String, Number) method of the CBORPairList class.

      Parameters:
      indent - The indent inherited from the upper CBOR item.
      indentUnit - Additional indent that should be added when nested CBOR items are stringified.
      Returns:
      The string expression of this CBOR pair and all the nested CBOR items.
      Since:
      1.5

    • encode

      public void encode(OutputStream outputStream) throws IOException
      Write CBOR representations of the key and the value into the specified output stream.
      Parameters:
      outputStream - An output stream to write CBOR representations into.
      Throws:
      IOException
